recipe.title: The Champagne Cocktail
ingredients: 1 dash The Truth Old Time Aromatic Bitters or Angostura bitters
instructions: Drop 1 dash The Truth Old Time Aromatic Bitters or Angostura bitters onto a sugar cube and place in a Champagne flute. Using a channel or paring knife, cut a 6" twist from a lemon and arrange inside glass. Gently pour 5 ounces chilled Champagne into glass.
